Title: Dark Wings, Dark Words
Writer: George R.R. Martin (based on "A Song of Ice and Fire" by), David Benioff (created by), D.B. Weiss (created by), Vanessa Taylor (written for television by)
Actors: Peter Dinklage, Nikolaj Coster-Waldau, Lena Headey, Kit Harington
Plot: Bran and company meet Jojen and Meera Reed. Arya, Gendry, and Hot Pie meet the Brotherhood. Jaime travels through the wilderness with Brienne. Sansa confesses her true feelings about Joffery to Margaery.
